item.title: Rep. Ogles: Add Trump to Mount Rushmore
item.description: A Republican lawmaker on Thursday proposed that President Donald Trump be added to Mount Rushmore.

item.title: Washington Post: Gabbard's Ethics Claim About Journalist Unfounded
item.description: The Washington Post on Thursday pushed back on Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard's claim that its reporter "harassed" her staff.

item.title: Trump: Economy in Second Term Will Blow First Term's Away
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday night boasted about how the U.S. economy is roaring and that its performance in his second term will "blow away" ho...

item.title: Trump Slams NYC Mayoral Nominee Mamdani in Iowa Speech
item.description: President Donald Trump launched a fiery attack on New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani at a pre-Fourth of July campaign-style rally in Iowa,...

item.title: Rasmussen: Harris Leads Dems for 2028 Presidential Run
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris leads the race for the Democratic Party's 2028 presidential nominee, Rasmussen Reports results showed Thursday.
